data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Ribeira Brava, Cape Verde. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ribeira Brava, Cape Verde
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 12,260 cultural Christians in the state of Ribeira Brava to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.section_summary: On average, 5 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next month in Ribeira Brava, Cape Verde.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Ribeira Brava.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,321 believers in Ribeira Brava to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Ribeira Brava
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Ribeira Brava, Ribeira Brava, Cape Verde.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Ribeira Brava, Cape Verde. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: the state of Ribeira Brava has (about) 1,321 people who know Jesus, 12,260 people who know about him culturally, and 2,219 people who are far from Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ribeira Brava, Cape Verde has a population of 15,800.

We estimate Ribeira Brava has 1,321 people who might know Jesus, 12,260 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,219 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Ribeira Brava, Cape Verde to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
